comment.author: 29418639@N06
comment._content: Dutch army, East-Indian troops, KNIL (Royal Dutch East-Indian Army). Canteen of the Colonial Reserves in Nijmegen. Men praying around the table, on the left the hornblower. Netherlands, 1939.

comment.author: 29877325@N07
comment._content: So close to the 2nd World War( 2yrs) and Pearl Harbor. Historical errors and insanity, in the name of basically good people, victims of their leaders militarism. Wow!!!.
